name: Gemini Wrapper
description: General-purpose LLM for text generation, conversation, and queries that don't require specialized agents

name: Adaptive Quiz Master Agent
description: Generates adaptive quizzes tailored to learner's performance. Tracks attempts and adapts difficulty for effective learning.

name: Assignment Coach Agent
description: Provides assignment understanding, task breakdown, resource suggestions, and progress guidance to students.

name: Plagiarism Prevention Agent
description: Analyzes text for plagiarism and rephrases content to improve originality while preserving meaning.

name: Research Scout Agent
description: Helps students find and summarize recent research papers, articles, and case studies on any topic.

name: Concept Reinforcement Agent
description: Generates focused learning activities for weak topics or when additional practice is needed.

name: Citation Manager Agent
description: Automatically generates, validates, and manages academic citations in various formats (APA, MLA, Chicago).

name: Peer Collaboration Agent
description: Monitors team discussions and analyzes collaboration patterns, participation, and communication quality.

name: Adaptive Flashcard Agent
description: Dynamically generates and personalizes flashcards based on student's learning progress and performance.

name: Presentation Feedback Agent
description: Analyzes presentation transcripts and provides feedback on confidence, material quality, and delivery.

name: Lecture Insight Agent
description: Analyzes lecture audio to extract key insights, generate summaries, and suggest learning resources.

name: Question Anticipator Agent
description: Predicts possible exam questions based on syllabus, past papers, and historical patterns.

name: Daily Revision Proctor Agent
description: Monitors daily learning activities, generates reminders, and provides adaptive study recommendations.

name: Study Scheduler Agent
description: Creates and optimizes personalized study timetables based on subjects, deadlines, and performance.

name: Exam Readiness Agent
description: Generates comprehensive assessments and evaluates student's exam preparation readiness.
